ingredients.ingredient: 4 boneless chicken breast halves with skin
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh herbs (thyme, parsley, rosemary)
4 tablespoons cold butter, cut into small pieces

cookingTips: Skin-side down first to render fat and create a golden, crispy exterior
Use the residual heat to finish cooking after flipping; don't overcook
Whisk cold butter into the pan sauce at the end for a silky, emulsified finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: I want to create a pan sauce with apple cider vinegar. Should I deglaze the pan, and how do I prevent it from breaking?
